content: what do you do when your scrap basket is out of control make yoyos each yoyo takes less than 10 feet of yarn so even a very small scrap ball will make at least one this pattern mimics the look of priscilla hewitt s flat braid joining with far fewer ends to weave join a row of as many yoyos as you like using a single strand of yarn please note this pattern is also referenced on the yoyo lapghan 1 page follow my pattern page on facebook 2 or visit my blog 3 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/yo-yo-lapghan 2 https //www facebook com/yarncrazy 3 http //www yarncrazy com
